actions.recommendation: Urgent urology referral done after sonar concluded the presence of a renal stone, increased prostate size& a renal cyst being present. Please f/u as per specialist recommendation
Vit D suboptimal - supplement with D3 5000iu daily and repeat in 3/12
Raised hs-CRP, raised homocysteine, Abnormal hearing screen, Raised BMI; Vit D suboptimal
You haven't had a cardiology assessment this year - please do a review with your cardiologist to review your current meds in view of kidney function
Nephrologist review recommended as Renal function at 45, with a raised creatinine
Cholesterol and BP controlled on treatment, BMI in overweight range but improving (well done!)
